:::Child looks up from his work and sees Gigatron:::

Child: "Gigatron! How nice to see you! Let me guess, my GodFather sent you to 
protect me right?"

:::Child Turned to Vulois:::

Child: "Gigatron is ok he is the Best friend of my god Father. Let him stay 
we might need an extra bot when going to the Alliance! after that   he can go 
home."

:::Child again turns to Gigatron and gives him a childish hug:::
